entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this morning then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 15.
